text: Kurzia sinensis is a species of liverworts in the Lepidoziaceae family. It is endemic to China. Its natural habitat is temperate forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Kurzia sinensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Kurzia sinensis
